pullRequest.title: chore(ci): abort build on connection errors
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
If a connection issue is detected:

the build will be set to aborted
the description will state the reason for the abort

Related issues
closes #4383

[ X ] All commit messages match our commit message guidelines
[ X ] The submitting code follows our code style
[ X ] If submitting code, please run mvn clean install -DskipTests locally before committing
